metadata.creator: Cory Doctorow
metadata.description: This week on my podcast, I read a recent Medium column, We Should Not Endure a King: Antitrust is a political cause, not an economic one, addressed to leftists who are skeptical of antitrust as a market-based solution that implictly accepts markets as the legitimate arbiter of our social relations.
metadata.subject: monopolism
antitrust
neo-brandeisians
hipster antitrust
leftism
self-determination
trustbusting
